title: Chandrika Vaddanam Pendant - Diamond-Studded Elegance
features: This exquisitely crafted Vaddanam pendant showcases a classic Addigai style, featuring a central floral motif adorned with sparkling cubic zirconia. The winged design adds a touch of regal elegance. Delicate gold ball drops (gundlu) cascade from the base, creating a graceful movement. Meticulously handcrafted with a durable Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of traditional glamour. Also suitable for grand parties and festive celebrations like Dasara and Diwali.
description: Elevate your traditional attire with this stunning Vaddanam pendant. Its timeless design, superior craftsmanship, and the brilliance of the cubic zirconia make it a truly special piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting luster, while the classic Addigai style adds a touch of South Indian heritage to your look. A versatile piece that can be paired with various traditional outfits.
